com.nhn.android.mapviewer.overlay

Interface NMapPOIdataOverlay.OnFloatingItemChangeListener

  • Enclosing class:
    NMapPOIdataOverlay

    public static interface NMapPOIdataOverlay.OnFloatingItemChangeListener
    Interface for listeners interested in when the state change of floating item.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPointChanged(NMapPOIdataOverlay poiDataOverlay, NMapPOIitem item)
      Called when the position of a floating item has changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onPointChanged

                  NMapPOIitem item)
        Called when the position of a floating item has changed.
        Parameters:
        poiDataOverlay - The POI data overlay whose floating item has changed.
        item - an object whose corresponding position has changed.
